  width,

} = getWindowDimensions();

  "directed": false,

  "focusZoom": 1,
  "height": height,
  "highlightDegree": 100,
  "highlightOpacity": 0.5,
  "linkHighlightBehavior": true,
  "maxZoom": 10,
  "minZoom": 0.1,
  "nodeHighlightBehavior": true,
  "panAndZoom": false,
  "staticGraph": false,
  "staticGraphWithDragAndDrop": false,
  "width": width,
  "d3": {
    "alphaTarget": 0.3,
    "gravity": -150,
    "linkLength": 3,
    "linkStrength": 2,
    "disableLinkForce": false
  },
  "node": {
    "color": "#3D3C3A",
    "fontColor": "black",

    "fontWeight": "normal",
    "highlightColor": "#E41B17",
    "highlightFontSize": 8,
    "highlightFontWeight": "bold",
    "highlightStrokeColor": "black",
    "highlightStrokeWidth": "#27332F",
    "labelProperty": "id",
    "mouseCursor": "pointer",
    "opacity": 1,
    "renderLabel": true,
    "size": 210,
    "strokeColor": "#C6DEFF",
    "strokeWidth": 1.6,
    "svg": "",
    "symbolType": "circle"
  },
  "link": {
    "color": "#d3d3d3",
    "fontColor": "black",
    "fontSize": 8,
    "fontWeight": "normal",
    "highlightColor": "#E41B17",
    "highlightFontSize": 8,
    "highlightFontWeight": "normal",
    "labelProperty": "label",
    "mouseCursor": "pointer",
    "opacity": 0.7,
    "renderLabel": true,
    "semanticStrokeWidth": false,
    "strokeWidth": 1.5,
    "markerHeight": 6,
    "markerWidth": 6
  }
};

function getWindowDimensions() {
  const {
    innerWidth: width,
    innerHeight: height
  } = window;
  return {
    width,
    height
  };
}

export default myConfig;

sourcesContent:
// the graph configuration, you only need to pass down properties
// that you want to override, otherwise default ones will be used

const {width, height } = getWindowDimensions();
const  myConfig = {
		"automaticRearrangeAfterDropNode": false,
		"collapsible": false,
		"directed": false,
		"focusAnimationDuration": 0.75,
		"backgroundColor": "black",
		"focusZoom": 1,
		"height": height,
		"highlightDegree": 100,
		"highlightOpacity": 0.5,
		"linkHighlightBehavior": true,
		"maxZoom": 10,
		"minZoom": 0.1,
		"nodeHighlightBehavior": true,
		"panAndZoom": false,
		"staticGraph": false,
		"staticGraphWithDragAndDrop": false,
		"width": width,
		"d3": {
				"alphaTarget": 0.3,
				"gravity": -150,
				"linkLength": 3,
				"linkStrength": 2,
				"disableLinkForce": false
		},
		"node": {
				"color": "#3D3C3A",
				"fontColor": "black",
				"fontSize": 8,
				"fontWeight": "normal",
				"highlightColor": "#E41B17",
				"highlightFontSize": 8,
				"highlightFontWeight": "bold",
				"highlightStrokeColor": "black",
				"highlightStrokeWidth": "#27332F",
				"labelProperty": "id",
				"mouseCursor": "pointer",
				"opacity": 1,
				"renderLabel": true,
				"size": 210,
				"strokeColor": "#C6DEFF",
				"strokeWidth": 1.6,
				"svg": "",
				"symbolType": "circle"
		},
		"link": {
				"color": "#d3d3d3",
				"fontColor": "black",
				"fontSize": 8,
				"fontWeight": "normal",
				"highlightColor": "#E41B17",
				"highlightFontSize": 8,
				"highlightFontWeight": "normal",
				"labelProperty": "label",
				"mouseCursor": "pointer",
				"opacity": 0.7,
				"renderLabel": true,
				"semanticStrokeWidth": false,
				"strokeWidth": 1.5,
				"markerHeight": 6,
				"markerWidth": 6
		}
};



function getWindowDimensions() {
		  const { innerWidth: width, innerHeight: height  } = window;
		return {
				    width,
				    height
		};
}

export default myConfig;
